channel.title: RHCSA Notes - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: RHCSA Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 (UPDATED) - Asghar Ghori Here are my notes from Asghar Goriâ€™s RHCSA book. Buy the book or read the reviews here. Chapter 1: Installation Chapter 2: Interaction Chapter 3: File Management Chapter 4: Advanced File Management Chapter 5: Basic User Management Chapter 6: Advanced User Management Chapter 7: The Bash Shell Chapter 8: Process and Task Scheduling Chapter 9: Basic Package Management Chapter 10: Advanced Package Management Chapter 11: Boot, Grub2, Kernel Chapter 12: Sysinit, Logging, Tuning Chapter 13: Basic Storage Partitioning Chapter 14: Advanced Storage Partitioning Chapter 15: Local File Systems and Swap Chapter 16: Networking Chapter 17: Network File System Chapter 18: Time Synchronization and Hostname Resolution Chapter 19: The Secure Shell Service Chapter 20: The Linux Firewall Chapter 21: Security Enhanced Linux Chapter 22: Shell Scripting Chapter 23: Containers Practice Exam 1 Practice Exam 2 Practice Exam 3 Practice Exam 4
